title: Khazix Drawring for a few rp please
body:
Could i please have 3 rp to buy leona[](http://images-1.jpeg)/Users/elipetch/Desktop/images-1.jpeg
Idk how to share it but please

PS: You guys are awesome

EDITEDITEDIT

RIOT i got link http://imgur.com/plNbUVa

replies.body:
Lookit these summoners working together to get that picture uploaded for me ^_^!

Since it's just a few rp, I've gone ahead and sent the poros out with your gift. Hit me back up and let me know what you plan on getting!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VBnoJHbf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-05T01:51:07.088+0000)
>
> Lookit these summoners working together to get that picture uploaded for me ^_^!
> 
> Since it's just a few rp, I've gone ahead and sent the poros out with your gift. Hit me back up and let me know what you plan on getting!!!

Thank you so much. I just needed 3 more rp for leona.

First you gotta upload that picture. Nobody's going to be able to see it on your own personal computer. Try uploading it to a site like http://imgur.com and then sharing the link to that photo. Beyond that I can't help, but this may help you towards your goal. Peace.

> [{quoted}](name=Divine Arcanine,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VBnoJHbf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-04T08:44:25.871+0000)
>
> First you gotta upload that picture. Nobody's going to be able to see it on your own personal computer. Try uploading it to a site like http://imgur.com and then sharing the link to that photo. Beyond that I can't help, but this may help you towards your goal. Peace.

Thanks
